description.uz: Kichik guruh - asosiy ko'nikmalarni shakllantirish
description.en: Junior group - forming basic skills

description.uz: O'rta guruh - bilim va ko'nikmalarni kengaytirish
description.en: Middle group - expanding knowledge and skills

description.uz: Katta guruh - maktabga tayyorgarlik
description.en: Senior group - school preparation

description.uz: Bolalar tabiiy ravishda o'yin orqali o'rganadilar. Bizning metodikamiz o'yinni asosiy o'qitish vositasi sifatida ishlatadi.
description.en: Children naturally learn through play. Our methodology uses play as the primary teaching tool.

description.uz: Mantiqiy fikrlash va xotirani rivojlantiruvchi maxsus o'yinlar
description.en: Special games for developing logical thinking and memory

description.uz: Ijtimoiy ko'nikmalar va muloqotni rivojlantirish
description.en: Developing social skills and communication

description.uz: Jismoniy rivojlanish va sog'lom turmush tarzi
description.en: Physical development and healthy lifestyle

description.uz: Fantaziya va ijodkorlikni rivojlantirish
description.en: Developing imagination and creativity

description.uz: Fazoviy fikrlash va mayda motorikani rivojlantirish
description.en: Developing spatial thinking and fine motor skills

description.uz: Ritm hissi va musiqiy qobiliyatlarni shakllantirish
description.en: Forming sense of rhythm and musical abilities

description.uz: Har bir bola o'ziga xos. Biz har bir bolaning kuchli tomonlari va qiziqishlarini hisobga olamiz.
description.en: Every child is unique. We consider each child's strengths and interests.

description.uz: Har bir bola uchun alohida o'quv rejasi tuziladi
description.en: A separate learning plan is created for each child

uz.content: Shaxsiy rivojlanish rejasi - bu bolangiz uchun maxsus tuzilgan yo'l xaritasi. Biz har bir bolaning o'ziga xos xususiyatlarini hisobga olib, individual o'quv dasturi tuzamiz.
items: Boshlang'ich diagnostika - bolaning hozirgi darajasini aniqlash
Uzoq muddatli maqsadlar - yillik rivojlanish rejasi
Har oyda rejani qayta ko'rib chiqish

en.content: Personal Development Plan is a specially designed roadmap for your child. We consider each child's unique characteristics and create an individual learning program.
items: Initial diagnostics - determining child's current level

description.uz: Bolaning tabiiy qobiliyatlarini aniqlash va rivojlantirish
description.en: Identifying and developing child's natural abilities

uz.content: Har bir bola o'ziga xos iste'dod va qobiliyatlarga ega. Bizning mutaxassislarimiz bolangizning kuchli tomonlarini aniqlash uchun maxsus metodikalardan foydalanadi.
items: Gardner ko'p qirrali intellekt nazariyasi asosida baholash

en.content: Every child has unique talents and abilities. Our specialists use special methodologies to identify your child's strengths.
items: Assessment based on Gardner's Multiple Intelligence Theory

description.uz: O'qitish tezligi va usullari bolaga moslashtiriladi
description.en: Learning pace and methods are adapted to the child

uz.content: Har bir bola o'ziga xos tezlikda o'rganadi. Biz o'qitish usullarini bolaning individual xususiyatlariga moslashtiramiz.
items: Vizual o'rganuvchilar uchun - rasmlar, videolar, diagrammalar
Audial o'rganuvchilar uchun - qo'shiqlar, hikoyalar, muhokamalar
Kinestetik o'rganuvchilar uchun - amaliy mashg'ulotlar, o'yinlar
O'qish-yozish orqali o'rganuvchilar uchun - kitoblar, yozuv mashqlari

en.content: Every child learns at their own pace. We adapt teaching methods to the child's individual characteristics.
items: For visual learners - pictures, videos, diagrams
For auditory learners - songs, stories, discussions
For kinesthetic learners - hands-on activities, games
For reading-writing learners - books, writing exercises
Adjusting activities based on child's mood

description.uz: Qiyin mavzular bo'yicha qo'shimcha yordam
description.en: Extra help on difficult topics

uz.content: Ba'zi mavzular bolalar uchun qiyin bo'lishi mumkin. Biz qo'shimcha mashg'ulotlar orqali har bir bolaga kerakli yordamni beramiz.

en.content: Some topics may be difficult for children. We provide necessary help to each child through additional classes.
items: Speech therapy sessions for speech development

description.uz: Yuqori qobiliyatli bolalar uchun maxsus mashg'ulotlar
description.en: Special classes for highly capable children

uz.content: Iqtidorli bolalar uchun maxsus dastur - ularning potentsialini to'liq ochish imkonini beradi. Biz ilg'or bolalar uchun qo'shimcha imkoniyatlar yaratamiz.

en.content: Special program for gifted children allows them to fully unlock their potential. We create additional opportunities for advanced children.

description.uz: Bolaning emotsional rivojlanishini kuzatish
description.en: Monitoring child's emotional development

uz.content: Bolaning emotsional salomatligi jismoniy salomatlik kabi muhim. Bizning psixologlarimiz har bir bolaning emotsional rivojlanishini kuzatib boradi.

en.content: Child's emotional health is as important as physical health. Our psychologists monitor each child's emotional development.

description.uz: Bolangizning rivojlanishini muntazam kuzatib boramiz va natijalarni siz bilan baham ko'ramiz.
description.en: We regularly track your child's development and share the results with you.

description.uz: Har oy oxirida batafsil rivojlanish hisoboti
description.en: Detailed development report at the end of each month

uz.content: Har oy oxirida bolangizning rivojlanishi haqida to'liq hisobot tayyorlaymiz. Bu hisobot barcha sohalarni qamrab oladi.
items: Nutq rivojlanishi - yangi so'zlar, gaplar, talaffuz
Mantiqiy fikrlash - matematik tushunchalar, muammolarni hal qilish
Jismoniy rivojlanish - motorika, koordinatsiya, sport ko'rsatkichlari
Ijodiy rivojlanish - rasm, qo'l ishlari, musiqa
Ijtimoiy ko'nikmalar - do'stlar bilan munosabat, guruhda ishlash

en.content: At the end of each month, we prepare a complete report on your child's development. This report covers all areas.
items: Speech development - new words, sentences, pronunciation
Logical thinking - mathematical concepts, problem solving
Physical development - motor skills, coordination, sports indicators
Social skills - relationships with friends, group work

description.uz: Har bir ko'nikma bo'yicha alohida baholash
description.en: Separate assessment for each skill

uz.content: Bolangizning har bir ko'nikmasi alohida baholanadi va yosh me'yorlari bilan taqqoslanadi.

en.content: Each skill of your child is assessed separately and compared with age norms.

description.uz: Bolaning ishlari va yutuqlarini to'plash
description.en: Collecting child's works and achievements

uz.content: Bolangizning barcha ishlari va yutuqlari maxsus portfolioda saqlanadi - bu uning rivojlanish tarixi.

en.content: All works and achievements of your child are stored in a special portfolio - this is the history of their development.

description.uz: Mobil ilova orqali real vaqtda kuzatish
description.en: Real-time tracking through mobile app

uz.content: Zamonaviy texnologiyalar yordamida bolangizning rivojlanishini real vaqtda kuzating.

en.content: Track your child's development in real-time using modern technology.

description.uz: Har chorak uchun aniq maqsadlar belgilash
description.en: Setting specific goals for each quarter

uz.content: Har chorak uchun aniq va o'lchanadigan maqsadlar belgilaymiz va ularga erishish yo'llarini rejalashtiramiz.

en.content: Each quarter we set specific and measurable goals and plan ways to achieve them.

description.uz: Yosh me'yorlari bilan taqqoslash
description.en: Comparison with age norms

uz.content: Bolangizning rivojlanishini ilmiy asoslangan yosh me'yorlari bilan taqqoslaymiz.

en.content: We compare your child's development with scientifically based age norms.

description.uz: Ota-onalar bilan doimiy aloqada bo'lish - bizning ustuvor yo'nalishimiz. Birgalikda bolangiz uchun eng yaxshi muhitni yaratamiz.
description.en: Constant communication with parents is our priority. Together we create the best environment for your child.

description.uz: Har kuni bolangiz haqida qisqacha ma'lumot
description.en: Brief information about your child every day

uz.content: Har kuni kechqurun bolangiz haqida qisqacha hisobot olasiz - nima yedi, qanday o'ynadi, kayfiyati qanday edi.
items: Ertalabki qabul - kayfiyat va sog'lik holati
Nonushta, tushlik, kechki ovqat - nima yedi

en.content: Every evening you receive a brief report about your child - what they ate, how they played, what their mood was.
items: Morning reception - mood and health status
Breakfast, lunch, dinner - what they ate
Sleep time - how long they slept

description.uz: Tezkor aloqa va yangiliklar uchun guruh
description.en: Group for quick communication and news

uz.content: Telegram guruhimiz orqali tezkor aloqa va yangiliklar almashish imkoniyati mavjud.

en.content: Through our Telegram group, there is an opportunity for quick communication and news sharing.

description.uz: Har oyda ota-onalar bilan uchrashuv
description.en: Monthly meetings with parents

uz.content: Har oyda ota-onalar yig'ilishi o'tkazamiz - bu yerda muhim masalalar muhokama qilinadi.

en.content: Every month we hold a parent meeting - important issues are discussed here.

description.uz: Tarbiyachi va psixolog bilan shaxsiy suhbat
description.en: Personal conversation with teacher and psychologist

uz.content: Tarbiyachi va psixolog bilan yakkama-yakka suhbat imkoniyati - bolangiz haqida batafsil gaplashing.

en.content: Opportunity for one-on-one conversation with teacher and psychologist - discuss your child in detail.

description.uz: Har chorakda mashg'ulotlarni kuzatish imkoniyati
description.en: Opportunity to observe classes every quarter

uz.content: Har chorakda ochiq eshiklar kuni - kelib bolangizning mashg'ulotlarini kuzating.

en.content: Open door day every quarter - come and observe your child's classes.

description.uz: Bayramlar va tadbirlarda birgalikda ishtirok
description.en: Joint participation in holidays and events

uz.content: Yil davomida turli bayramlar va tadbirlar - oila bo'lib birga vaqt o'tkazing.

en.content: Various holidays and events throughout the year - spend time together as a family.
